clues.text: Of Kansas:This state

clues.category: WHAT IS THAT IN THE ARTWORK?
clues.text: Clasped by Marie Antoinette in Élisabeth Vigée-LeBrun's then-edgy portrait:A pink this, Marie's signature flower
Meaning "forget about it", it's what you might tell an old friend about that issue you 2 had a falling-out over
This media clan's real-life succession drama looks a lot like on-screen "Succession" drama:CHORD UM
It's Latin for "and the rest"; we often use it as a single word

clues.category: THE DC UNIVERSE WITH JAMES GUNN
clues.text: (James Gunn presents the clue.) My new film, "Superman", is partly inspired by the comic book "All-Star Superman";David Corensweat stars as the Man of Steel & Rachel Brosnahanplays this legendary reporter
Of Algeria:This nation on the Mediterranean

clues.category: WHAT IS THAT IN THE ARTWORK?
clues.text: In the right hand of Louis XIV in the classic 1701 portrait by Rigaud:This staff, a symbol of royal authority
Down Under, a billabong is one of these for thirsty animals; elsewhere, it's a 2-word slang term for your local bar
This last name is No. 1 on Forbes' list of America's Richest Families:LOW TAN
3-syllable "and"s include "furthermore" & this word with the "more" at the start

clues.category: THE DC UNIVERSE WITH JAMES GUNN
clues.text: (James Gunn presents the clue.) I went online & searched "What's the dumbest DC character of all time?" & I found a character who first appeared in Detective Comics No. 300 namedPolka-Dot Man; I love him so much that I made him part of my rogues' gallery inthis2021 movie
Of the Dominican Republic:This country

This royal dynasty may be terminé in France, but it still has rulers in both Spain & Luxembourg:ON OR BUB
A way to say "and" is "in" this, an operation so simple that kids learn to do it

clues.category: THE DC UNIVERSE WITH JAMES GUNN
clues.text: (James Gunn presents the clue.) My brother Sean read a clue about being part of the sorry ragtag bunch called "The Protectors of the Universe" who helped out "The Revengers" or something like that; over here at DC, we have a different group of heroes,thisone with the Green Lantern & Aquaman, who got their first series in 1960
Of Suffolk County, New York:This county whosecoliseumis now run by Las Vegas Sands

clues.text: In the lap of Whistler's mother:A white one of these, to go with her mourning clothes

In French this word signifies "and more"; it's found before "ça change..."

clues.text: (James Gunn presents the clue.) One of the coolest DC comic book characters co-created by Len Wein & further explored by Alan Moore isthisgreen behemoth who came about in the Louisiana bayou

clues.text: In Frida Kahlo's self-portrait "Fulang-Chang and I":This pet, sporting a ribbon
